name: Autodesk Reality Capture Mesh
summary: An RCM file is a reality capture mesh created in Autodesk ReCap Pro. It contains a 3D model that was created from either terrestrial laser scans, via ReCap's now-discontinued Scan-to-Mesh feature, or photos, via ReCap's Photos feature. RCM files were also previously used by Autodesk ReMake, before Autodesk discontinued that program.
